title: Taylors physicke has purged the divel, or, The divell has got a squirt and the simple seame-rent thred bare Taylor translates it into railing poetry and is now foundly cudgelled for it / by Voluntas Ambulatoria.
author: Walker, Henry, Ironmonger.
notes: Written by Henry Walker.  Cf. Wing.
A satire on John Taylor the water poet.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
